title: For my *hopefully* 1000th win in normals
body: So I am one win away from one thousand wins and would really really really appreciated it if a riot employee were to play a game with me

replies.body:
**waves* *
Skins QA Analyst here, support main if you'll have me :)

Whoa. Just like KateyKhaos. I guess everyone on the Skins QA mains support, and the only ones to play with people for their 1,000th win. Just...like...KateyKhaos. Must be your all's role model or something. =P

She came after me, ohoho xD She's a very nice lady and has ramped up super fast in Skins QA~!
We're also some of the more active people in the forums haha, so we get around :)

I'll be online in a bit for an invite if you're still around :)

What. I'm not the poster. lol

Unless you also meant for me to invite when you have free time or something
Okay. Added. Not playing at the moment though, but in a bit. Got some stuff to take care of.
Cool beans, I'll have more free time this evening too :)

Evening. Right. California. 7pm here so yeah. lol. Okay. Would it be like a couple hours or so before your on??

Edit: I. just. realized. you. said. cool beans. LOL
Sent the request, sorry I didn't respond sooner I was afk for awhile.

I have an idea. The 3 of us could play. Seeing how he also had me add him. Me, you, him, and I have a friend that I frequently play with that I'll be wanting to invite. So that's 4 people. =P The 5th could be whoever. Flan can invite Katey along with or something, or some other Rioter. If we got no one, I think I can get a friend on that would be happy to play with a Rioter.

Alright have to go to town for a bit, will be on later, thanks for responding!
I hope we can play soon!
Yes and i am saying jimeney crickets. GET OUT OF THE FUTURE MAN AND GET OFF YOUR HIGH HECARIM
